item.description:
Staying in your Center: how to remain "up" no matter what!
Tuesday, May 29, 7:00-8:30 pm $35.

Do circumstances and events in the world get you down? Do you go "off" when those around you are less than peaceful?  Are you impacted by noise, crowds, media? This class will bring you an awareness of how your energy field supports or hinders your alignment. Take a revealing quize to learn just how sensitive you are. You will then learn how to raise and protect your energy sytem anywhere, anytime, and how to keep your optimism in the midst of chaos. Each participant will receive a ten-minute RYSE clearing and an initiation to the Bands of Protection, one of the sacred Rites of the Munay-Ki. This will help you stay contained in your own energy field.  Join other sensitve beings in this supportive atmosphere to share, learn and gain empowerment.
item.name: Staying in your Center-a program for Highly Sensitive People
